meanings: (말·힘·무기 등으로) fight, do battle (with); (말다툼하다) argue, quarrel; (전쟁을 하다) be at a war (with)
contend[fight] to a finish[the last ditch]
be apt to pick quarrels with others

examples.korean: have a fight 발음듣기 싸우다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
to fight racism/corruption/poverty, etc. 발음듣기 인종차별주의/부패/가난 등에 맞서 싸우다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
to fight with sb 발음듣기 …와 싸우다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
He that fights and runs away may live to fight another day. 발음듣기 싸우다 도망간 자는 다음날 살아서 다시 싸울 수 있다. (서양속담, 지혜속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: He that fights and runs away may live to fight another day. 발음

examples.korean: contend for one's faith[existence, freedom] 발음듣기 자신의 신념[생존, 자유]을 위하여 싸우다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
